name: Nosey Jumpers AR
description:
Nosey McNostril, the main character of Nosey Jumpers, is on a quest for the Golden Crown. Fighting aliens, pirates, mad scientists through ten exciting levels full of fun, you will have lots of joy in this augmented reality platformer game by DRCoderz. Check out its playability on https://youtu.be/6H0pOfxs8X0

Version 1.0 of this app does not support the following:
-Saving game state through game sessions, such as your game score

Only available on devices that support ARKit (iOS 11 and above).

Thanks for your support!
